page.title: 03ECOLOGY
page.content: We studied the ecology in our area and we found that the wildlife was mainly birds and dogs.The birds were mostly sparrows and blackbirds.The plantlife was mainly trees and flowers in peoples gardens.There was plenty of grass at the side of the pathway.The dogs and cats that we saw were mainly peoples pets.The trees that we saw were mainly oak and chestnut trees. If you were lucky you would see something like a hedgehog.The insects consisted of flies, spiders and worms. The other birds we saw were crows and magpies.The wildlife didn't have much chance because most of the land was covered with houses and gardens.There were very few fields and the main crop was wheat. Trees have just started to blossom and gardens have just flowered.
